text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sun in my eyes
New day in the big city life
All the dreams are electrified
Gonna reach for the sky so high

[Verse 2]
Traffic jams and the crowded streets
Feel the rhythm the heartbeat
Neon signs it's a busy beat
Life's a show it's on repeat

[Chorus]
City lights city lights
Shine so bright all through the night
City lights city lights
Make it feel make it feel right

[Verse 3]
Found love in a small cafe
Holding hands in the heart of the fray
Busy world fades far away
With you it's a perfect day

[Bridge]
Concrete jungle never sleeps
Tall buildings secrets it keeps
In this maze we make our leaps
Chasing dreams taking big heaps

[Chorus]
City lights city lights
Shine so bright all through the night
City lights city lights
Make it feel make it feel right
title: City Lights
